events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because the size doesn't fit me at all. Please assist.
The request has been identified as a refund inquiry based on the customer's intent to return the product and get their money back.
An agent from the customer support team has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and request a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the reason for the return, so we can process your refund as quickly as possible?
My order number is 4589273. The jacket is too small, and unfortunately, it doesn't zip up properly, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a return for your jacket and process the full refund once the item is received at our warehouse. I will send you the prepaid return label shortly.
Great, I appreciate the quick response. I look forward to receiving the return label so I can send the jacket back.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We wanted to check if you have successfully returned the jacket and if the refund process is going smoothly. Please update us if there are any issues.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday via the provided label and just checked my bank; the refund has already appeared. Thank you for the help!
We are glad your refund has been completed. Closing the case now, and feel free to reach out anytime for assistance in the future.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Please take a moment to share your feedback on your refund experience with us.
